Another thing you can do is target a button combination. The process is like pulling out the battery of your phone and compulsively shutting down the device:

If you fail to restart your device yet, press and hold while the phone is charged.

This time you can plug in the charging cable and leave it for about 5 minutes.

And then you will do the same thing after 5 minutes – press and hold the “volume down” button and “power” button at the same time.
